statements: DELETE FROM asset_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_id = 123 AND version = 2;
DELETE FROM asset_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM version_control WHERE version_creator = 'John Doe' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM project_assets WHERE project_id = 5 AND version_id = 10;
DELETE FROM project_assets WHERE project_id = 1 AND asset_id = 2 AND version_id = 1;
DELETE FROM asset_tags WHERE asset_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' AND tag = 'important';
DELETE FROM asset_tags WHERE tag = 'important' AND asset_id IN (SELECT asset_id FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'image');
